text:
@George_Osborne @MattHancock It IS a creditable achievement, given the poor base start, but he spoiled it by fiddling the figures

In any walk of life "going to happen" doesn't count as "happened"

By empty bragging ( in many aspects of #covid19 ) HMG actually obscured what it HAS achieved

1/2
